title: Jinx has a 54.25% win rate with a 19.12% pick rate

replies.body:
I'm not the kind of guy who just constantly trashtalks Yasuo and everything about him...

But I can't help but notice the irony of the situation here.
Your name is WIND WALL.
Not too long ago, Yasuo had very similar stats, I think Yasuo's win and playrate were even higher than that?
There's a decent amount of Jinx threads right now, but it ain't even close to the amount of Yasuo threads we had during that patch o.o

_Really not trying to mindlesly hate on Yasuo, even though I do find him annoying, but the Irony is there_
yasou had a win rate as high as 58.7% before the recent patch

Aye, so he did.
I just wanted to point out the Irony about the fact that a player who is most likely a Yasuo main made this thread :P
I mean I'm a Gangplank main, I'm as much of an asshole as he might be :^)
i still rather fight a {{champion:222}} then a {{champion:157}} at least vs the {{champion:222}} she cant dash around ever 1 sec or ult me and be untargetable during the ult from half the lane away

jinx get caught
jinx get dead
yasuo gets caught?
mecahnics lel.
If Yasuo gets caught he's just as dead as Jinx is.
Why this got down voted? He has a point, Anyone who get's *CAUGHT* they'll die instantly even if its a 5000 HP Tank.

Jinx is more "fair" to play against. Her weaknesses and strengths, and power curve, as well as counter-itemization are much more clear.

Yasuo is much more diluted, due to his overloaded kits. His weaknesses aren't really static; it's determined by how good the Yasuo is. As are his strengths. What is static is the safety in his kit and the ton of mobility, making him really annoying to deal with. His power curve is weird. No weak phase, and he hyperscales. He has armor pen on his ult to shred you, he has a lot of sustained dmg as a fighter, but still bursts like an assassin. He can go tanky too. A lot of it has been fixed with the Yasuo nerfs, notably the "50% bonus armor pen only applies to crit" which was great.
Except most abilities used to get caught out are skillshots, which Yasuo can press W to negate.
Yas can negate more than just skill shots, some point and clicks create projectiles that are destroyed by Windwall (Panth Spear for example).
RIP {{champion:161}} E.

*Zilean throws a bomb*
*Bomb lands on ground*
*Yasuo walks over it*
*Windwalls over the bomb on the ground*
*Bomb disappears into nowhere-land*

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/masonry/000/259/943/694.png

You don't understand the definition of "getting caught".

If somebody can just walk away from you, then you were nowhere near catching them.

Here's a scenario. I'm Morgana. I have one of the longest CC abilities in the game. Sweet. So I wait in an unwarded bush for someone to pass by. 

Let's say {{champion:5}} happens to walk there. I throw a Q at him. He gets rooted, and my team who was doing dragon near there jumps on him. Boom, free pick.

Let's say now that {{champion:157}} strolls by. I throw my Q. He panic walls in the wrong direction and blocks my Q anyway. Then he walks off like nothing happened.

Do you see my point now? Any ability that would catch normal champions out is now negated by Yasuo's nope wall. And he walks off scot-free even if he aimed the wall at the wrong direction, because of the starting from his model bullshit.

But sure, Yasuo is totally fair and fun to play against when he has three defensive portions of his kit while being a hyper-carry with extreme slightly-situational mobility, range, and stat enhancers.

Your example is extremely biased, so no point got across.

Let's try again, three different situations.

1. Morgana is sitting the the death-brush, while her team is doing Dragon.
a. Xin Zhao either face-checks or walks by the death-brush. In both cases Morgana snares him with 99.9% accuracy.
Xin Zhao dies.
b. Yasuo face-checks or walks by the death-brush. In both cases Morgana snares him with 99.9% accuracy.
Yasuo dies.

2. Situation number two: Morgana is in the dragon pit instead of the death-brush.
a. Xin Zhao walks close to the wall. Morgana snares him, because it was short ranged and he couldn't see the binding through the wall.
Xin Zhao dies.
b. Yasuo walks close to the wall. Morgana snares him, because it was short ranged and he couldn't see the binding through the wall.
Yasuo dies.

3. Morgana stays out in the open.
a. Xin Zhao walks to the Dragon pit and sees Morgana. He side-steps it.
b. Yasuo walks to the Dragon pit and sees Morgana. He side-steps it.

Yasuo can use his Wind-Wall even when the skillshot is on him to destroy it.  The time required for that is easily small enough to do it in a panic as a response to a skillshot.

The way you talk about it is as though Morg's Q is invisible.  Even if the target would be hit within a quarter second of flying, Yasuo could block it.
so ur saying while rooted from from morg q, he can just press w and release himself from it? we arent talking about gangplank
You . I like you .
Yasuo hate is strong in the boards

At this point I have no fucking clue about the people in here.

I get -14 for saying Yasuo dies when he gets caught, but at the same time you get +22 for saying I'm correct.

https://m.popkey.co/6bbfda/eWqlr_f-maxage-0.gif
Just league boards things.

well you mike call it mechanics ... i get it yasou does take some skill to play... but all champs do. some are more "mechanically intense then other" and other champs are " knowledge base" knowing when and how to go in. ill admit part of my issue with yasou is i am a bot lane player most of the time and majority of that being a support main so i dont have a ton of games laning against yasou. so in the few games i have as top or the one or two games i got stuck mid ( i dont play mid ) i didnt have a good time. alot of that was due to lack of experience of the match up but even with that with his power with the 2 item crit , armor pen, mobility, shield, wind wall, and his ult along with the bug and the items he used being strong he was a real headache to play against.
IT WAS A BUG. A GOD DAMN FUCKING BUG AND YALL ARE STILL MILKING YOUR BALLS OVER IT
yet they still nerfed him and nerfed the tank build he was using... so not all bug , IT WASNT JUST A BUG
Yes freelo force was broken, and the bug, but IT WAS MAINLY THE BUG. Freelo force is strong, but it's worth shit if you fail to get ahead.
it was more then the bug... otherwise he wouldnt of been nerfed nor the items he abused. they would of just fixed the bug and let it go
No, the bug had a higher impact, and the tank build had a lower one. That's why Tank build got nerfed, and yes Tanksuo is broken as shit, no one denies that.

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jLne6ExY,comment-id=0003000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-18T15:19:29.806+0000)
>
> No, the bug had a higher impact, and the tank build had a lower one. That's why Tank build got nerfed, and yes Tanksuo is broken as shit, no one denies that.

but it still more then a bug... other wise he the champ wouldnt of got nerfed
I literally just explained this shit in the previous comment.

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jLne6ExY,comment-id=000300000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-18T15:22:26.530+0000)
>
> I literally just explained this shit in the previous comment.

you can try to twist it anyway you want .... the whole reason why his win rate was soooooooooo hhhhhiiiigggghhhhh was partly the BUG and the ITEMS he used and HIS POWER FULL KIT .... it was 3 part that is why all THREE got addressed in the last patch. 

that is all im saying and you keep wanting to harp that it was just a bug but, IT WAS MORE THEN THE BUG

Riot: "oh look at that, jinx is doing perfectly fine and is in a good spot"
Riot: "let's buff them for worlds"
*Jinx's winrate and playrate skyrockets*
Riot: "hmm, weird"
I got so mad when they buffed her. Like WHY? She was in a great spot.

they only buffed her ult tho?

idk how often you are dying to jinx ults but...
It was still an unnecessary buff, that's the point I'm making.
Makes my Jinx rocket montages easier to make, I suppose?
Easier objective steals. That extra 50% scaling for long range snipes has gotten me a few dragon steals and a red steal.

reminds me when i stole blue with gp ult
fun globals
Yeah she is freelo. Once she has Hurricane and IE you might aswell ff.
I remember during early season 5 when Jinx had a 55% winrate and a 35% pickrate. This is nothing by comparison.
Lucian has a fucking 32.01% pick rate.

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jLne6ExY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-18T14:46:43.186+0000)
>
> Lucian has a fucking 32.01% pick rate.

And how's his win rate doing compared to Jinx?
oh its alot worse i just wanted to point it out because i thought it was funny
Its because he is the only Adc that you can safely blind pick.

> [{quoted}](name=Immortal spax,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jLne6ExY,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-18T15:22:24.467+0000)
>
> Its because he is the only Adc that you can safely blind pick.

{{champion:81}} You called?

i've always said jinx was OP even from release.

her Q is basically a twitch ult (except better). 

her rockets should not be "i crit one, the rest also get crit" and her rockets shouldn't do 100% splash damage, it should be capped or else you're giving her free autos at bonus range too.

I love this.
First Corki and Kalista op.
Nerf directly/undirectly, their winrate and palyrate dropped. 
Lucian and Ezreal op.
Nerf directly/undirectly, their winrate and palyrate dropped.
Then Jhin and Ashe.
Nerf directly/undirectly, their winrate and palyrate dropped.

Then the next strongest ADCs take their place.
Do you see the pattern?
The main issue is Jinx was buffed when she didn't need it, forcing her into the strongest ADC spot

She was barely buffed at all lol
>**Super Mega Death Rocket!**
-Minimum AD ratio increased to 15% bonus AD from 10% bonus AD.
-Maximum AD ratio increased to 150% bonus AD from 100% bonus AD.

The last buffs before that were in 6.10.  This is literally just the ADC cycle.
